review: So far I still haven't been able to set up my Fire TV. It's not as simple as "plug and play" if you have an older computer with "hardwired" internet. And I found that you need to be a bit of a techie to differentiate an Ethernet hub from a splitter from a router, etc., etc. And Fire TV doesn't seem to have any telephone customer service which would be a BIG HELP to us non-techies! I'm looking forward to EVENTUALLY getting this thing set up(if I don't take a sledge hammer to it first). I'm trying an ethernet cable from another company,....and of course with Prime by the name in case it too, needs to be returned. If there are any techies out there who have helpful suggestions re: what the heck I need to get this up and running, I'd appreciate it!!
